about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in various procedurally generated open worlds, where magic and mathematics collide. In Spell Magic, you'll craft and master powerful spells using the fundamental forces of arithmetic, geometry, and algebra.

As a skilled mathemagician, you'll explore a vast, ever-changing realm, teeming with fearsome monsters and challenging puzzles. Your quest is to unravel the secrets of the mystical arts, harnessing the power of numbers to bend reality to your will.

Craft Your Spells

Combine mathematical concepts to create an arsenal of unique spells. Experiment with:

  • Geometric patterns for your shields and projectiles

  • Algebraic equations to create perfectly placed elemental attacks

  • Vector arithmetic to warp the 3rd dimension with your movement

As you progress, learn new mathematical techniques and concepts to expand your spellcasting repertoire.

Explore Procedurally Generated Worlds

Each time you play, the world is reborn, offering a fresh experience. Various options to customize any new game are available. Options such as starting with any available upgrades or any amount of gold. Various modes all the way from permadeath to invincible exist with many more in-between.

Battle Monsters

Face off against a diverse array of monsters, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. Use your mathematical prowess to outmaneuver and defeat them, and claim their essence to fuel your spellcraft.

Solve Puzzles and Unlock Secrets

Decipher spells dropped by enemies to learn new techniques (or just use them directly back at any other enemy). Combine and configure artifacts collected to create overpowered builds. But be careful as not all artifacts will provide you with benefits.
